name: Illwoon
desc: Effective against armored units. -4 Spd penalty.

name: Rapier
desc: Effective against calvary and armored units.

name: Shadow Sword
desc: Blake only. Restore half of max HP when unit defeats a foe. -5 Spd penalty.

name: Midnight Sword
desc: If unit initates combat, unit gains +4 Atk/Def. -2 Spd penalty.

name: Blessed Sword
desc: Effective against terrors. Restores 5 HP each turn.

name: Levin Sword
desc: Deals magic damage. Cannot critical. -3 Spd penalty.

name: Ladyblade
desc: Doubles might if equiped by a female unit. -1 Spd penalty.

name: Saunion
desc: Effective against flying units. -1 Spd penalty.

name: Rhomphia
desc: Effective against cavalry and armored units. - 3 Spd penalty.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Sol
desc: An ancient weapon. Absorbs HP equal to damage dealt to enemy. -4 Spd penalty.

name: Daybreak Lance
desc: If enemy initates combat, unit gains +4 Atk/Def. -2 Spd penalty.

name: Blessed Lance
desc: Effective against terrors. Restores 5 HP each turn.

name: Radiant Lance
desc: Deals magic damage. Cannot critical. -3 Spd penalty.

name: Radiance
desc: Deals magic damage. Cannot critical. -2 Spd penalty.

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Luna
desc: An ancient weapon. Never misses its target. -5 Spd penalty.

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: unit.wexp['Light'] or unit.wexp['Anima'] or unit.wexp['Dark'] or unit.wexp['Staff']

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Nosferatu
desc: Absorbs HP equal to damage dealt to enemy. No HP cost.

name: Seraphim
desc: Effective against terrors. -4 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 4.

name: Purge
desc: Extended range. -10 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 5.

name: Fimbulvetr
desc: Effective against flying units. -3 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 5.

name: Quake
desc: Effective against all units except flying. Will always miss against flying units. -10 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 9.

name: Ragnarok
desc: A legendary spell. -10 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 10.

name: Contagion
desc: Poisons foe on hit. -4 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 4.

name: Medusa
desc: Reduces foe's current HP to 1. -20 Spd penalty. HP Cost: 7.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Fili Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.
